DESCRIPTION: Allows you to create and manage giveaways on your servers.
DAY_LIMIT: A giveaway cannot last more than 15 days.
NO_WINNERS: Please specify a number of winners.
WINNERS_INVALID: Please specify a valid number of winners. Not that this cannot be higher than 50.
PRIZE_TOO_LONG: Please specify a shorter price. (max 250 characters)
NO_ID:
Please specify the giveaway message id.
[Click this link to find out how to get it](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/206346498-Where-can-I-find-my-User-Server-Message-ID-)
ASK_ID: {{loading}} Please specify the ID of a giveaway.
WHAT_TO_EDIT:
{{loading}} Please choose what you want to edit:
:one: : time
:two: : prize
:three: : winners
ASK_TIME: {{loading}} Please specify how long you want to add / remove.
ASK_WINNERS: {{loading}} Please specify a new number of winners.
TIMEOUT_PRIZE: Time is up, you haven't specified a new price.
TIMEOUT_WINNERS: Time is up, you haven't specified a new number of winners.
TIMEOUT_TIME: Time is up, you haven't specified a time to add / remove.
TIMEOUT_ID:
Time is up, you did not specify an ID.
[Click this link for how to get it](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/206346498-Where-can-I-find-my-User-Server-Message-ID-)
CANCELED: Editing of the giveaway has been canceled.
UPDATE: The giveaway will update in less than {{time}} seconds.
NO_EDIT_OPTION: Please specify an option to modify: time, winner, prize
END: The giveaway will complete in less than {{time}} seconds.
NO_MESSAGE_FOUND: No messages were found, please check the ID.
SUCCESS_COLOR: The color of the giveaways has been updated.
LINK_HEX: Click here to find out more.
SUCCESS_END_COLOR: The end color of the giveaways has been updated.
NO_CONF_OPTION: Please specify an option to configure: color, endcolor.
NO_OPTION: Please specify an action: create, edit, reroll, end, config, delete
